title: Textile, "Kibiso Window", 2009
medium:
Medium: silk (raw silk and kibiso) and polyurethane
Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft that is cut
description: Sheer grey panel with white bands of supplementary weft that is cut to make a pattern of squares and rectangles across the surface. Alternating bands of supplementary weft were shrunk before cutting to create creases in the grey textile.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Kibiso Window", 2009.
2009. Medium: silk (raw silk and kibiso) and polyurethane
Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft that is cut. Gift of NUNO. 2009-48-1.
